name: Behind you (itch) (Dmitry Manannikov)
description:
In this runner game you run from zombies by tapping keys in proper order. Collect upgrades and survive as much as you can.

Tap fast when you approach spheres:

  • S – for orange
  • D – for green

Cretits:

  • Music: "Ethernight Club". Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com). Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0. http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
  • Icons: RPG inventory items
  • Environment: Meshtint Free City Lite Pack Mega Toon Series
